items.name: var propagated: [String : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary of attachments to copy when propagating attachments from one object to another.

items.name: var nonPropagated: [String : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary of attachments to not copy when propagating attachments from one object to another.

items.name: subscript(String) -> CMAttachmentBearerAttachments.Value?
items.desc: Gets the value associated with the specified attachment.

items.name: subscript(CMSampleBuffer.AttachmentKey) -> CMAttachmentBearerAttachments.Value?
items.desc: Gets the value associated with the specified attachment key.

items.name: func merge([String : Any], mode: CMAttachmentBearerAttachments.Mode)
items.desc: Sets a collection of attachments on the object.

items.name: enum CMAttachmentBearerAttachments.Mode
items.desc: An enumeration that defines the available attachment modes.

items.name: func removeAll()
items.desc: Removes all attachments from this object.
